        public static void initialize(int f)

      • generate

        public static RandomWalkGraph generate(int n,
                       int f,
                       int s,
                       cern.colt.matrix.tdouble.DoubleMatrix1D trueParameters,
                       double alpha)
        Generate artificial graph used for testing purpose as explained in the paper, the graph representation is an ArrayList of FeatureFields
        Parameters:
        n: - number of nodes
        f: - number of features
        s: - the index of the starting node
        topN: - the top ranked N nodes to be put in the D set
        trueParameters: - the parameters used for building the adjacency matrix
        alpha: - the damping factor used for the pagrank when building the D set
        Returns:
        RandomWalkGraph

      • buildDandL

        public static void buildDandL(RandomWalkGraph graph,
              int topN,
              cern.colt.matrix.tdouble.DoubleMatrix1D parameters,
              double alpha)
        Builds the D set (created links) for synthetic graph and known parameter values, by taking the first topN highest ranked nodes. s is the node whose links we are looking at.
        Parameters:
        graph: - the Graph for which the D set is being generated
        D: - the D set
        L: - the L set
        topN: - the top ranked N nodes to be put in the D set
        parameters: - the parameters used for building the adjacency matrix
        alpha: - the damping factor used for the pagerank when building the D set
